top.title: Trump says 'framework of a future deal' discussed on Greenland as he backs off tariffs threat
top.summary: At Davos, the US president said he would not use force to take the island and later floated a possible "forever" deal.

top.title: Trump's jibes are wearing thin for many of Europe's leaders
top.summary: The ball is in the court of European leaders ahead of Thursday's emergency EU meeting in Brussels, writes Nick Beake.

top.title: EU suspends approval of US trade deal
top.summary: The move follows renewed tensions between the US and EU, as Donald Trump pushes to acquire Greenland.

top.title: Bezos' Blue Origin announces satellite rival to Musk's Starlink
top.summary: Blue Origin will be focused on businesses and governments, while Starlink also offers services to individual customers.

top.title: Snap settles social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial
top.summary: TikTok, YouTube and Meta remain defendants in the case, which is due to kick off next week.

top.title: UK consulting on bringing in social media ban for under 16s
top.summary: The government said it expected schools to be "phone-free by default" as a result of the announcement.
